verses.text: Ha Jehová, Dios Axonhejochi, a ix loloni. Ix yavtej eb' cajan t'a yol yib'anhk’inal tik, b'aj sjavi k'u masanto b'aj tz'em k'u.
Ha t'a tzalan Sion, aton chonhab' te wach' yilji, ata' sch'ox sakil k'inal Dios.
Tik sja co Diosal, palta manh ichnhejoctalaj ol javoc. Ha t'a spatic yichanh ay jun k'ak' to satumeli yet' jun chacxuxum ik'.
Ato t'a chaanh tz'avtaj eb' aj satcha’anh yet' eb' cajan t'a sat lum lum tik yuj Dios, yic wach' syil eb' sch'olb'itaj schonhab'.
Syal Dios icha tik: Molb'ejec e b'a ex vicxo, a ex eyak'nac jun silab' t'ayin, ayic eyak'annac e trato ved'oc, xchi.
Ha satcha’anh sch'oxani to ha Dios Juez ton t'a stojolal.
Syalanpax Dios icha tik: Ex in chonhab' Israel, ab'ecnab'i, jichan ol vutej valanoch e paltail t'a e sat. Ha in Dios in, e Diosal in.
Maj ex in tumejlaj yuj eyofrenda tzeyak'taxon t'ayin yet' nok' nok' tze nhus silab'il t'ayin t'a valtar.
Max in k'anlaj nok' quelemtac vacax molb'il eyuuj. Malaj nok' mam chiva t'a yol e macte' tzin k'an t'ayex.
Vicnhej masanil nok' caltacte'al nok', vic pax nok' molb'etzal nok' ay t'a jolomtac vitz.
Vic masanil nok' much ay t'a caltac te' yet' masanil tas tzek' t'a cal vayumtac.
Q'uinaloc ay in vejel, manh ol val-laj t'ayex, yujto vic jun yol yib'anhk’inal tik yet' masanil tas ay t'ay.
¿Tocval a sb'ak'chil nok' vacax tzin chi'a? ¿Tocval a pax schiq'uil nok' mam chiva svuq'uej?
Ha silab' tzin nib'ej, to tzeyak' yuj diosal t'ayin, tzeyaq'uelk'och tas tzeyaltej t'ayin, a in ton ek' in to t'a yib'anh smasanil.
Ayic ay eyaelal, avtejinec, ol ex in colo', a exxo ol in eyik'chaanh, xchi Dios.
Axo t'a eb' chuk sb'eyb'al, syal Dios icha tik: ¿Toc ay eyalan eyic eyalanel in k'ayb'ub'al, ma eyalanel yab'ixal in trato?
Ina to max yal-laj e k'ool tzex in cacha', malaj yelk'och in lolonel t'ayex.
Ayic sja vinh elk'umtaxoni, tzex q'ue urnaj e b'at yet' vinh. Te wach' eyak'anpax yet' eb' sk'ulan ajmulal.
Palta a tas tze k'ulej, to tze naq'ue lolonel, max ex och vaan eyesani.
Ha t'a eb' eyuk'tac junnhej e nun yet'oc, tzeyal chukal lolonel t'a spatic eb'.
Ayic ix e k'ulan juntzanh chukal tik, malaj tas svala'. Yuj chi' tze na' to lajan in eyed'oc, palta ol valoch e mul chi' t'a e sat, ol vil-lajoch in sat eyed'oc.
Ha ex tzin b'at satk'olal eyuuj tik, wach'ocab' tz'aj snachajel jun tik eyuuj, haxo talaj tz'aji, ol ex in jatchitejb'ati, manhxalaj mach ol ex colan t'ayin.
Ha mach tz'ak'an yuj diosal t'ayin, ay velk'och t'a yol sat. Ha mach tzin k'anab'ajani, ol in colcaneli, xchi Dios.
